chart.title: Fish and seafood consumption per capita
chart.subtitle: Data is inclusive of all fish species and major seafood commodities, including crustaceans, cephalopods and other mollusc species.
chart.note: Data is based on per capita food supply at the consumer level, but does not account for food waste at the consumer level.
chart.citation: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2023)
